constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 78 (Tuesday, May 10, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MOORE of Wisconsin:
H.R. 7710.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H4798]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Counter Human Trafficking Research and Development Act
